# Clear DNA for phenotype: Intelligence
emf_dna_clear_flags_for_int = {
	clr_flag = int_AA
	clr_flag = int_Aa
	clr_flag = int_aa
	clr_flag = int_BB
	clr_flag = int_Bb
	clr_flag = int_bb
	clr_flag = int_CC
	clr_flag = int_Cc
	clr_flag = int_cc
}

# Set DNA for known phenotype: Dwarfism
emf_dna_set_flags_for_dwarf = {
	random_list = {
		3 = {
			set_flag = dwarf_aa
		}
		2 = {
			set_flag = dwarf_Aa
		}
	}
	random_list = {
		3 = {
			set_flag = dwarf_bb
		}
		2 = {
			set_flag = dwarf_Bb
		}
	}
	random_list = {
		3 = {
			set_flag = dwarf_cc
		}
		2 = {
			set_flag = dwarf_Cc
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			NOR = {
				has_flag = dwarf_aa
				has_flag = dwarf_bb
				has_flag = dwarf_cc
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			1 = {
				clr_flag = dwarf_Aa
				set_flag = dwarf_aa
			}
			1 = {
				clr_flag = dwarf_Bb
				set_flag = dwarf_bb
			}
			1 = {
				clr_flag = dwarf_Cc
				set_flag = dwarf_cc
			}
		}
	}
}

		9 = {
			set_flag = wrymouth_CC

		9 = {
			set_flag = wrymouth_Cc
		}
		2 = {
			set_flag = wrymouth_cc
		}
	}
}

# Flip all homozygous recessive genes into homozygous dominant genes
emf_dna_reverse_homozygous_recessive = {
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = int_aa }
		clr_flag = int_aa
		set_flag = int_AA
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = int_bb }
		clr_flag = int_bb
		set_flag = int_BB
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = int_cc }
		clr_flag = int_cc
		set_flag = int_CC
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = attr_aa }
		clr_flag = attr_aa
		set_flag = attr_AA
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = attr_bb }
		clr_flag = attr_bb
		set_flag = attr_BB
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = attr_cc }
		clr_flag = attr_cc
		set_flag = attr_CC
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = str_aa }
		clr_flag = str_aa
		set_flag = str_AA
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = str_bb }
		clr_flag = str_bb
		set_flag = str_BB
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = str_cc }
		clr_flag = str_cc
		set_flag = str_CC
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = hgt_aa }
		clr_flag = hgt_aa
		set_flag = hgt_AA
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = hgt_bb }
		clr_flag = hgt_bb
		set_flag = hgt_BB
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = hgt_cc }
		clr_flag = hgt_cc
		set_flag = hgt_CC
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = dwarf_aa }
		clr_flag = dwarf_aa
		set_flag = dwarf_AA
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = dwarf_bb }
		clr_flag = dwarf_bb
		set_flag = dwarf_BB
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = dwarf_cc }
		clr_flag = dwarf_cc
		set_flag = dwarf_CC
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = clubfooted_aa }
		clr_flag = clubfooted_aa
		set_flag = clubfooted_AA
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = clubfooted_bb }
		clr_flag = clubfooted_bb
		set_flag = clubfooted_BB
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = clubfooted_cc }
		clr_flag = clubfooted_cc
		set_flag = clubfooted_CC
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = hunchback_aa }
		clr_flag = hunchback_aa
		set_flag = hunchback_AA
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = hunchback_bb }
		clr_flag = hunchback_bb
		set_flag = hunchback_BB
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = hunchback_cc }
		clr_flag = hunchback_cc
		set_flag = hunchback_CC
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = harelip_aa }
		clr_flag = harelip_aa
		set_flag = harelip_AA
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = harelip_bb }
		clr_flag = harelip_bb
		set_flag = harelip_BB
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = harelip_cc }
		clr_flag = harelip_cc
		set_flag = harelip_CC
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = lisp_aa }
		clr_flag = lisp_aa
		set_flag = lisp_AA
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = lisp_bb }
		clr_flag = lisp_bb
		set_flag = lisp_BB
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = lisp_cc }
		clr_flag = lisp_cc
		set_flag = lisp_CC
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = stutter_aa }
		clr_flag = stutter_aa
		set_flag = stutter_AA
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = stutter_bb }
		clr_flag = stutter_bb
		set_flag = stutter_BB
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = stutter_cc }
		clr_flag = stutter_cc
		set_flag = stutter_CC
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = deaf_aa }
		clr_flag = deaf_aa
		set_flag = deaf_AA
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = deaf_bb }
		clr_flag = deaf_bb
		set_flag = deaf_BB
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = deaf_cc }
		clr_flag = deaf_cc
		set_flag = deaf_CC
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = wrymouth_aa }
		clr_flag = wrymouth_aa
		set_flag = wrymouth_AA
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = wrymouth_bb }
		clr_flag = wrymouth_bb
		set_flag = wrymouth_BB
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = wrymouth_cc }
		clr_flag = wrymouth_cc
		set_flag = wrymouth_CC
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = perc_aa }
		clr_flag = perc_aa
		set_flag = perc_AA
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = perc_bb }
		clr_flag = perc_bb
		set_flag = perc_BB
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_flag = perc_cc }
		clr_flag = perc_cc
		set_flag = perc_CC
	}
}
